title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Production in thousand cwt, with a total of 19 data points.
Overall Production in thousand cwt has increased over the Year
Production in thousand cwt is rapidly constant from 2000 to 2017, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2017 to 2018.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
Max Production in thousand cwt about 35646.0 was recorded at Year 2017
Min Production in thousand cwt about 12799.0 was recorded at Year 2002
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Production in thousand cwt, with a total of 19 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2005 to 2011.
Also, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2013 to 2018.
Also, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2002 to 2005.
Also, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2011 to 2013.
But, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2000 to 2002.
